install.name: Scientific Calculator
install.author: Urmila Champatiray
install.description:
Scientific Calculator Module for Joomla 1.5 is a best calculator for financial sites

© Joomla SEO Tips

Joomla Calculator
 - Change Log- Some calculation errors removed. You can get the exact Multiplication value now;
 - Best Scientific calculator for Joomla;
 - Comes with Trigonometric Functions;
 - Logarithmic and Exponential Functions also Added;
 - Made with JavaScript;
 - Future addition will be extra parameters in modules to change height and width of Buttons;
 - To swap between advanced and simple calculator and a record screen tab;
